description: 环境处理插件 Hooks 配置

hooks.command: if [ -n "$CLAUDE_ENV_FILE" ]; then for env_file in .claude/.env .claude/.env.local; do if [ -f "$env_file" ]; then grep -v '^#' "$env_file" | grep -v '^$' | while IFS= read -r line; do echo "export $line" >> "$CLAUDE_ENV_FILE"; done; fi; done; fi; exit 0
